About.title: About Me
About.subtitle: Clinical Psychologist specialized in evidence-based therapy and integral wellbeing
About.intro: I am a Clinical Psychologist with over 13 years of experience in mental health. Since my beginnings in Psychology, I have been passionate about understanding the complexity of the human mind and applying evidence-based strategies to support people in their personal development and wellbeing. Throughout my career, I have worked with individuals from different parts of the world, helping them face emotional, behavioral, and relational challenges.

experience.title: NHS Experience
experience.description: My professional experience includes a significant period at the UK's National Health Service (NHS), where I worked at the Merton Integrated Recovery Hub (IRH) and the Community Rehab Team. At Merton IRH, I was part of the recovery and support team, providing structured psychological interventions to patients and caregivers. Subsequently, in the Community Rehab Team, I worked on rehabilitating patients transitioning from long-term mental health units to the community, designing intervention plans to facilitate their integration.

approach.title: Therapeutic Approach
approach.description: My therapeutic approach is based on Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT), combined with analytical psychology tools, always adapting to each person's individual needs. Through a collaborative process, I help my clients identify thought and behavior patterns that may be limiting their wellbeing, promoting practical strategies to generate meaningful and sustainable changes.

mission.title: My Mission
mission.description: My mission is to provide a safe and constructive space to explore challenges, discover opportunities, and ultimately promote positive changes. I invite you to learn more about my services and take the first step towards integral wellbeing, whether individually or within your company.

reflective.description: A structured and facilitated approach to enhancing workplace decision-making, team dynamics, and leadership effectiveness. ProfessionalMemberships.title: Professional Memberships
ProfessionalMemberships.description: As part of my commitment to professional development, I am a full member of the Russian Psychological Society, the International Association of Cognitive Behavioural Therapy (IACBT), and the British Psychological Society (BPS).
